plot: With time running out - and an assassin close behind - Hopper's crew races back to Hawkins, where El and the kids are preparing for war.

Larry Kline puts on a 4th July Carnival for the residents of Hawkins. During the fireworks, El and her friends are under attack from the Mind Flayer in Hopper's cabin, and El gets wounded in the leg. They escape in Nancy's car. Meanwhile Dustin and Erica drive the drugged Steve and Robin away in a cart, trying to escape the Russian soldiers. They return to the Starcourt Mall and hide in a movie theater showing "Back to the Future". Hopper, Joyce, Murray and Alexei drive to the Carnival to rescue the children. Alexei demonstrates how to destroy the machine opening The Gate.—Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
